title: Full Spectrum Energy Medicine - Blue Bell, PA
description: Specialties: Energy Medicine for all stages of life. Brennan Healing Science, CranioSacral Therapy Manual Lymphatic Drainage, Sound and light therapies: Healing through the Senses, Full spectrum phototherapy,Energy Field Analysis, owsing, Kinesiology, Bio-Resonance Testing & Therapy, Informational Medicine, Naturopathy -- Detoxification protocols, Ear Candling, Iridology Sclerology. Functional Medicine Metabolic Testing Nutrition -- herbs, enzymes, vitamins, natural antibiotics, flower essences, aromatherapy, homeopathics Anti-Aging Medicine--Metabolic Testing, Microcurrent: Non-surgical facelifts, hair regrowth, trauma /injury Established in 1995. After 17 years in mainstream medicine, we recognized the need for holistic medicine--for gentle yet effective natural remedies that consider physical, emotional, mental and spiritual wellbeing. After launching Full Spectrum Energy Medicine as a purely bioenergetic practice, we slowly integrated natural medicine, including botanicals, herbal medicine. lymphatic drainage and cranio-sacral therapy. Today, we have evolved even further to incorporate Functional Medicine, a new frontier which focuses on the whole person and utilizes laboratory testing as a scientific foundation for comprehensive assessment. Together, we find this approach to be the most effective and rewarding.
